message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. Given its unique features and potential, I'm initially offering it at $1,100,000. I believe this represents a fair price considering the significant value it will bring to your business.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I still think $980,000 is a fair price for the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $980,000 is a significant gap from what I consider a fair price. This product offers unique advantages that will benefit your business in the long run. I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. I believe this demonstrates my commitment to finding a mutually agreeable solution.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm not sure I can go up to $1,020,000. I'm willing to meet you at $1,000,000
